text:
A Tense Encounter

Zossimov leaves, pleased with himself.  
“Family will aid his recovery,” he smiles.  

---

Razumihin follows, anxious and tense.  
“Go to bed! I'll report tomorrow!”  

---

Zossimov leers, “That girl is fetching!”  
Razumihin erupts, “You dare say that?”  
“Let me go, you drunken devil!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Zossimov visits Raskolnikov's family, expressing optimism about the patient's recovery while Razumihin reacts violently to Zossimov's comments about Avdotya.
